Text: FWHi Debra This company wants to buy Gas from ENA I told them I would forward a GISB to you Let me know what I can do to help Thanks Roger Original Message From Kirby Black mailto Sent Wednesday October PM To Reynolds Roger Subject Roger Please get this to the right people so we can start buying gas from Enron I enjoyed the game yesterday Thanks again Kirby Kirby SBlack Falcon Gas Storage Company YorktownSuite Houston Texas fax Mobile mailto
